transcript: Could you think this is how I thought it was going to turn out? Do you think I had some great fantasy down the line at four years down the line? That we'd come to the beach and argue with each other over fish?

segments.text: Could you think this is how I thought it was going to turn out?
Do you think I had some great fantasy down the line at four years down the line?
That we'd come to the beach and argue with each other over fish?
